verbs.description: An immigrant - rights group [V: is] appealing a ruling from a federal judge in Maryland favoring the Trump administration 's plans to end a program deferring deportation of young immigrants .

[ARG0: An immigrant - rights group] is [V: appealing] [ARG1: a ruling from a federal judge in Maryland favoring the Trump administration 's plans to end a program deferring deportation of young immigrants] .

An immigrant - rights group is appealing [ARG0: a ruling] from a federal judge in Maryland [V: favoring] [ARG1: the Trump administration 's plans to end a program deferring deportation of young immigrants] .
An immigrant - rights group is appealing a ruling from a federal judge in Maryland favoring the Trump administration 's plans to [V: end] [ARG1: a program deferring deportation of young immigrants] .

An immigrant - rights group is appealing a ruling from a federal judge in Maryland favoring the Trump administration 's plans to end [ARG0: a program] [V: deferring] [ARG1: deportation of young immigrants] .
